steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine milk and 1 teaspoon of the garlic in a small saucepan and cook over medium, stirring occasionally, until just bubbling around the edges, 4 to 5 minutes. steps: Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook apples, stirring occasionally, until tender, 5 to 8 minutes. Transfer to a bowl; let cool completely.. steps: Stir yeast and warm water together in a large bowl and let stand for 15 minutes.. Add 1 tablespoon olive oil, sugar, all-purpose flour, and salt.
